item.description:
Come see Avenue Q at PPAC

This play is supposed to be amazing, a little racy though. One critic called it Sesame Street gone Southpark. Think Bert & Ernie surfing the Web for porn. It won a Tony and looks hilarious! Here's a behind-the-scenes video

I'm getting Orchestra seats because after a couple of plays sitting in the nosebleed section, it's really not worth the money, you can't see anything. So the ticket + those outrageous handling fees (PPAC, Amazon) = $67. Please RSVP and pay online in advance. Don't wait -- I'm getting tickets early because I'm sure this one will sell out!

The play starts at 8 pm. We'll meet in the lobby at 7:15 p.m. to get our tickets and seats. We'll be on the right side of the lobby, near the doors and will have a small red & white Meetup sign.

After the play, we'll head to Tazza , a few blocks away, for dinner/drinks/apps/dessert.

More info here. And here's another bootleg video -- hilarious!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby on the right side -- holding red & white Meetup sign
item.name: Avenue Q - PPAC
